data.title: BRIDGE Housing
data.meta_description: BRIDGE Housing is a leader – four decades in the making – in creating safe, healthy, and affordable housing communities up and down the West Coast where residents are empowered to grow and thrive.
data.text:
Opening Doors.

Uplifting Lives.

BRIDGE Housing is a leader – four decades in the making – in creating safe, healthy, and affordable housing communities up and down the West Coast where residents are empowered to grow and thrive.

130

properties

30,000+

residents

$3.5B

portfolio

Co-founders, Don Terner and Alan Stein

Building on 40 Years of Leadership, Innovation and Impact

Each day, we are guided by the same dedication and commitment of our visionary founders. Learn more about BRIDGE Housing’s origins, leaders, and milestones in expanding access to affordable housing.

Ken Lombard

President & CEO, BRIDGE Housing

Bold leadership is vital to addressing the housing affordability crisis at scale.

Our committed and experienced team believes in disrupting the status quo. We cultivate innovative partnerships while deploying a variety of public and private financing vehicles to deliver quality affordable housing in communities where demand outpaces supply and costs are often out of reach.

Helping residents build better futures.

With residents as our partners, we develop community-based programs tailored to the unique needs of each BRIDGE community. These programs help deliver life-changing results.

programs

program hours

nonprofit partners

Smarter Collaborations, Bigger & Better Results.

We work with best-in-class partners across a wide range of sectors – including government entities, community-based organizations, local businesses, and financial institutions – to grow our portfolio and extend our impact.

We are proud to work with dedicated partners like BRIDGE to ensure that our most vulnerable populations have a place to call home.”

Matt Reilein

President and CEO, National Equity Fund

In the News

BRIDGE Housing is a leading voice in affordable housing on the West Coast and nationally. Read more about our communities and investments.
